article_title: Hugh Jackman and Samuel L. Jackson help surprise this bride in adorable wedding video
article_text:
Topics: bride, celebrities, Hugh Jackman, kate winslet, Marriage, samuel l jackson, Video, wedding, Entertainment News

Sky News entertainment reporter Joe Michalczuk has been sneaking in a few personal questions in his interviews with celebrities lately. On Saturday, Michalczuk surprised his bride, Jenny, at their wedding with an adorable video of celebrities congratulating her.

Stars like Kate Winslet and Samuel L. Jackson hammed it up for Jenny, the latter introducing himself as Laurence Fishburne and advising her to get a pre-nup. The best wishes came from Aussie stud Hugh Jackman, however, who chastised the bride for her choice of groom until he realized that it was probably too late to back out.

Joe and Jenny are now enjoying their honeymoon, but you can sit here and enjoy this:
